intro: This is a very safe strategy that allows people in retirement to allocate their funds in a way that still slowly grows, but skips the hiccups that may occur when the market is down. For this example, we will say that 75k are the expenses in retirement, and we have about 2 million dollars saved.

subtopics.par: So technically, according to this diagram, which has a conservative market return, you can live forever off of 2 million dollars without ever being the mercy of the market. Now 2 million is a lot, but it is totally achievable if you start early and work hard.
